ygData.subject: Re: Exploit ?
ygData.msgSnippet: Shame on you fo killing a born again Ogre! I conned him and he regarded me(a High Elf Wizard) Warmly! tisk tisk tisk the things people will do to get a level
ygData.messageBody:
Shame on you fo killing a born again Ogre! I conned him and he regarded me(a
High Elf Wizard) Warmly!

tisk tisk tisk

the things people will do to get a level

oh careful how many times you kill him..you dont want to piss off his friend
that raised him from a pup!

Personally I hope he tears you a new one...

Auraelle
E'ci
19 lev
